title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1800.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1800.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The regulations in this Subchapter are promulgated by the

Commissioner of Housing and Community Renewal to effectuate and regulate urban
renewal programs in the State of New York pursuant to the Urban Renewal Law
(General Municipal Law, article 15) and to the Urban Renewal Agency Act
(General Municipal Law, article 15-A). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1800.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
